#include <stdio.h>
const int max = 500;

int a[max + 18], b[max + 18];
int x, y, z;

int main()
{
scanf("%d", &z);
    while (z--)
    {
    scanf("%d%d", &x, &y);
    for (int i = 1; i <= x; ++i) scanf("%d", a + i);
    for (int m = 1; y; m <<= 1, y >>= 1)
	if (y & 1)
	{
	    for (int j = 1; j <= x; ++j) b[j] = a[j];
	    for (int l = ((-m % x + x) % x) + 1, r = (m % x) + 1, j = 1; j <= x; ++j)
	    {
		a[j] ^= b[l++] ^ b[r++];
		if (l > x) l = 1;
		if (r > x) r = 1;
	    }
	}
    for (int i = 1; i <= x; ++i) printf("%d ", a[i]);
    printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
